pma:database.name: projectOne
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `Portfolio` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `splash` blob, `title` varchar(500) NOT NULL, `description` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `collaborators` varchar(500) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
